author: dmitriishmatko
content: is it me bugging or latest dora update?

author: pk910
content: that looks like the duty calculation is off,  so dora expects another proposer for each slot and marks it as missed..

author: pk910
content: are you already on devnet 5 specs with the new duty calculation from https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/4039 ?

author: pk910
content: yea,   this isn't merged yet ðŸ˜„  https://github.com/ethpandaops/dora/pull/195   coming soon

author: pk910
content:
can you retry with this in your kurtosis config?
```
dora_params:
  image: ethpandaops/dora:master
```

It should have the new duty calculation now,  but haven't been able to test it yet without a client ðŸ˜„

author: pk910
content:

author: pk910
content: teku and probably a compatible el client ðŸ™‚

author: dmitriishmatko
content: no published docker, but it's built from this branch

author: dmitriishmatko
content:
runnning with following config (changed dora to master for this run)
```
participants:
  - el_type: geth
    cl_type: teku
    cl_extra_params: [
        --p2p-subscribe-all-custody-subnets-enabled
    ]
    cl_image: consensys/teku:develop
    cl_min_cpu: 2000
    cl_min_mem: 2000
  - el_type: geth
    cl_type: teku
    cl_image: consensys/teku:develop
    cl_min_cpu: 2000
    cl_min_mem: 2000
network_params:
  electra_fork_epoch: 1
  fulu_fork_epoch: 2
#snooper_enabled: true
global_log_level: info
additional_services:
  - dora
  - goomy_blob
  - prometheus_grafana
#  - blob_spammer
dora_params:
  image: ethpandaops/dora:fulu-support
```

author: pk910
content:
yea, issue identified and fix on the way!
works fine on my side now,  thx for the config ðŸ™‚

author: pk910
content: fixed and updated the `fulu-support` branch too ðŸ™‚
